prompts.title: Book Prompt
prompts.body: Tell me two of your favorite books. Send it to me.

prompts.title: 2Flowers
prompts.body: Make a bouquet of flowers with pens. Hand them to your partner.

prompts.title: Life Gives Lemons
prompts.body: Draw them on a piece of paper. Give that drawing to somebody. Tell them, "Life gave you lemons"

prompts.title: Spirit Animals
prompts.body: Draw your spirit animal on a small piece of paper. Pass it to the person to the left of you.

prompts.title: Thoughtful Numbers
prompts.body: Say it out loud.

prompts.title: Migration Station
prompts.body: Migrate to the middle of the room. Stay there until further notice.

prompts.title: Phrase Craze
prompts.body: Write your favorite phrase on a piece of paper. Put it in the jar that's on the stage.

prompts.title: Memory
prompts.body: Give me one sentence about your happiest memory.

prompts.title: Shake Hands
prompts.body: Shake hands with one of the presenters.

prompts.title: light
prompts.body: Turn off a light. Turn it back on.

prompts.title: modern art
prompts.body: What do you think of modern art?

prompts.title: Box
prompts.body: You open a box. What's in it?

prompts.title: nightmare
prompts.body: When was the last time you had a nightmare?

prompts.title: drum
prompts.body: Drum roll some pens.

prompts.title: emotion
prompts.body: What emotion does this image give you?

prompts.title: rumor
prompts.body: Have you heard of the rumor?

prompts.title: stage
prompts.body: Walk across the stage to the center. Pose as your favorite sculpture.

prompts.title: door
prompts.body: Knock on a door.

prompts.title: time
prompts.body: Describe time in one sentence.

prompts.title: pet
prompts.body: What is the last thing you said to your pet?

prompts.title: year
prompts.body: What common phrase describes your year?

prompts.title: haiku
prompts.body: Autumn so fleeting. Ascending mental Reverb. ________.

prompts.title: mind
prompts.body: What is never in your mind?

prompts.title: barter
prompts.body: Barter with somebody near you.

prompts.title: giraffe
prompts.body: Discuss with anyone about the possibility of giraffes being too tall

prompts.title: portrait
prompts.body: Get someone to draw your portrait.

prompts.title: realize
prompts.body: What is your latest realization?

prompts.title: fear
prompts.body: Write an irrational fear.

prompts.title: decade
prompts.body: Describe one   decade.
